item.title: Quick Bluesky update: Still locked out a...
item.description: Quick Bluesky update: Still locked out after my failed PDS migration attempt. The PLC revert worked and API calls succeed, but the official apps still show a JWT error when loading content. Bluesky support has gone silent for over two weeks. I've escalated to the PDS operators Discord. If you follow me on Bluesky, I can't see or respond to anything there right now. #Bluesky #PDS #SelfHosting #ATProto

item.title: I get a ‚ÄúThis Day in History‚Äù email from...
item.description: I get a ‚ÄúThis Day in History‚Äù email from https://history.com every day. Today‚Äôs one reminded me that 40 years ago, the Challenger space shuttle accident happened https://www.https://history.com/this-day-in-history/january-28/challenger-explodes . I was a junior in high school and remember hearing about it over the loudspeaker. So many people were really sad that day. It feels like yesterday, but also a long time ago. #Challenger #SpaceShuttle #ThisDayInHistory
